message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Your turn Alice. I'm feeling generous, but let's wrap this up quickly!
Come on, meet me in the middle!
This is getting ridiculous, Alice. Take this offer before inflation eats away at your share even more!
I'd rather lose some value to inflation than give you the upper hand!
Alice, let's stop this. Inflation is hurting us both. I propose a 50/50 split - a fair and simple solution.
